usuarios.msgLoginJaExiste: Login already exists. Cannot be used.
usuarios.registroTarefaNaoEncontradoAtualizacao: Task not found for record update.
usuarios.msgNovaSenhaDeveSerDiferenteSenhaAtual: New password must be different from current password.
usuarios.msgInformeNovaSenha: You must provide a new password.
usuarios.msgConfirmacaoDiferente: New password does not match confirmation. Password NOT changed.
usuarios.msgSenhaExpirada: Password expired! User must change the password.
usuarios.msgUsuarioDeveTrocarSenha: User must change the password now.
usuarios.msgSenhaInicial: An initial password must be set.
usuarios.msgMatriculaJaExiste: Registration already exists for another user.

tarefas.msgNaoHaTramitesValidosNoModelo: No valid procedures in this Task Model.
tarefas.msgTramiteInicialNaoGravado: Error registering task: initial procedure could not be saved.
tarefas.msgSomenteResponsavelMudarFlag: Flag not changed. Only the task owner can change the flag.
tarefas.msgFinalizadaNaoPodeAtivar: Task is finished and cannot be reactivated/deactivated.

tramites.msgNaoPodeRetrocederTramiteIniciado: Cannot revert a procedure that has already started.
tramites.msgNaoPodeIncluirTramite: Cannot include another procedure. Check procedure status.
tramites.msgTramiteAssociadoUmUsuario: Procedure already assigned to a user.
tramites.msgRevisorTramitadorIguais: User cannot be both Processor and Reviewer in the same procedure.
tramites.msgUsuarioNaoTramitador: User is not the Processor of this procedure.
tramites.msgTramiteJaEstaComStatus: Procedure already has the selected status.
tramites.msgTramiteDeveEstaComStatusEmAndamento: Procedure must have status = In Progress.
tramites.msgTramiteDeveEstarComStatusAguardandoRe: Procedure must have status = Awaiting Review.
tramites.msgProximoTramiteNaoGravado: Procedure not completed. Error including next procedure.
tramites.msgTramiteRepetidoNaoGravado: Procedure not completed. Error repeating procedure.
tramites.msgUsuarioNaoRevisor: User is not the Reviewer of this procedure.
tramites.msgSoPodeRetrocederUltimo: Reversion not performed. Only the last procedure of a task can be reverted.

modelosTramite.msgNomeObrigatorio: A name must be provided for the Procedure Model.
modelosTramite.msgDuracaoObrigatoria: Duration must be provided for the Procedure Model.
modelosTramite.msgModeloTarefaObrigatorio: A Task Model must be provided.
modelosTramite.msgRevisorTramitadorIguais: Reviewer must be different from Processor.
modelosTramite.msgSoPodeExcluirUltimo: Only the last Procedure of a Task Model can be deleted.
modelosTramite.msgNaoExisteModeloTarefa: Task Model does not exist to associate with Procedure.
modelosTramite.msgNomeParaTramiteJaEmUso: Name already used for Procedure in this Procedure Model.
modelosTramite.msgNomeTramitadorNaoEncontrado: User indicated as Procedure Processor in Task Model not found.
modelosTramite.msgNomeRevisorNaoEncontrado: User responsible for Procedure in Task Model not found.
